sections.title: Activities of Daily Living and Social History

questions.text: Let's start with your daily living situation. How would you describe your current living arrangement?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know your living situation for your safety planning. Please could you tell me if you live alone, with family, in residential care, or another arrangement?
questions.section: Activities of Daily Living and Social History

questions.text: How would you describe your mobility?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about your mobility for your care planning. Please could you tell me if you are fully mobile, use a walking aid, use a wheelchair, or have other mobility needs?
questions.section: Activities of Daily Living and Social History

questions.text: Do you smoke or have you smoked in the past?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know your smoking history for the anaesthetic plan. Please could you tell me if you have never smoked, are an ex-smoker, or currently smoke?
questions.section: Activities of Daily Living and Social History
followUpQuestions: How many cigarettes per day did you or do you smoke?
When did you start smoking?
If you've quit, when did you stop smoking?

questions.text: How many units of alcohol do you drink per week?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about alcohol consumption for your safety. Please could you give me a number of units per week, or say 'none' if you don't drink alcohol?
questions.section: Activities of Daily Living and Social History

questions.text: Have you had a general anaesthetic before?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about previous anaesthetics for your safety. Please could you tell me yes or no if you've had a general anaesthetic before?

questions.text: Have you or any family members had problems with anaesthetics?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about any anaesthetic problems in you or your family for safety. Please could you describe any problems or say 'none' if there haven't been any?
followUpQuestions: Could you describe what problems occurred with the anaesthetic?
Was this with you personally or a family member?
Do you know what type of anaesthetic caused the problem?

questions.text: Have you been told you have a difficult airway or breathing tube placement?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about airway difficulties for safety. Please say yes or no if you've been told about difficult airway or breathing tube problems?

questions.text: Have you had any previous operations?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about previous operations for planning. Please say yes or no if you've had any operations before?

questions.text: Please describe your previous operations and approximate dates, or say none if you haven't had any.
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need details about previous operations. Please could you tell me what operations you've had and roughly when, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: Were there any complications with your [CONDITION]?
How did you recover from the [CONDITION]?
Are you still under follow-up care for any of these operations?

questions.text: Do you have any breathing problems or lung conditions?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about breathing conditions for your anaesthetic safety. Please could you tell me about any lung problems like asthma, COPD, sleep apnoea, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: Could you tell me more about your [CONDITION]? When was it diagnosed?
How well controlled is your [CONDITION]? Do you have symptoms regularly?
What medications or treatments do you use for your [CONDITION]?
Have you been hospitalized for your [CONDITION] in the past year?

questions.text: Do you get short of breath?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about breathlessness. Please say never, only on exertion, at rest, or unable to lie flat?

questions.text: Do you use any inhalers?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you use any inhalers?
followUpQuestions: What inhalers do you use? Please name them if you know.
How often do you need to use your reliever inhaler?
Do you use a preventer inhaler daily?

questions.text: Do you have any heart conditions?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know about heart conditions for your anaesthetic safety. Please could you tell me about any heart problems or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: Could you tell me more about your [CONDITION]? When was it diagnosed?
What medications do you take for your [CONDITION]?
Have you had any recent changes in your [CONDITION] or its treatment?
Do you see a cardiologist or heart specialist regularly?

questions.text: Do you get chest pain?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you get chest pain?
followUpQuestions: When do you get chest pain? During exercise, at rest, or other times?
How would you describe the chest pain?
What helps relieve the chest pain?

questions.text: How far can you walk on the flat before stopping?
questions.clarification: I'm sorry, we need to know your exercise tolerance. Please could you tell me: more than 1 mile, half to 1 mile, 100-500 yards, less than 100 yards, or cannot walk?

questions.text: Do you have diabetes?
questions.clarification: Please say no, type 1 diabetes, type 2 diabetes, or gestational diabetes?
followUpQuestions: How do you manage your diabetes? With diet, tablets, or insulin?
How well controlled is your diabetes? Do you check your blood sugar?
Have you had any complications from diabetes?
When did you last see your diabetes specialist?

questions.text: Do you have any thyroid problems?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you have thyroid problems?
followUpQuestions: What thyroid condition do you have? Overactive or underactive?
What medications do you take for your thyroid?
When did you last have your thyroid levels checked?

questions.text: Do you have any brain or nervous system conditions?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about any brain or nerve conditions like epilepsy, stroke, Parkinson's, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: Could you tell me more about your [CONDITION]? When was it diagnosed?
What medications do you take for your [CONDITION]?
How does your [CONDITION] affect your daily life?
Have you had any recent changes in your [CONDITION]?

questions.text: Do you have any mental health conditions?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about any mental health conditions like depression, anxiety, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: What treatment do you receive for your [CONDITION]?
Are you taking any medications for your [CONDITION]?
How are you feeling currently with your [CONDITION]?

questions.text: Do you have any stomach or bowel problems?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about any stomach or bowel problems like reflux, ulcers, IBS, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: How do you manage your [CONDITION]?
What medications do you take for your [CONDITION]?
How severe are your symptoms currently?

questions.text: Do you suffer from nausea and vomiting?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you suffer from nausea and vomiting?

questions.text: Do you have any liver problems?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you have liver problems?
followUpQuestions: What liver condition do you have?
What caused your liver problem?
Are you under specialist care for your liver?

questions.text: Have you ever been jaundiced or yellow?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you've ever been jaundiced?

questions.text: Do you have any kidney problems?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you have kidney problems?
followUpQuestions: What kidney problem do you have?
Are you on dialysis or do you have a kidney transplant?
What medications do you take for your kidneys?

questions.text: Do you have any urinary problems?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about urinary problems like frequent urination, difficulty, blood, incontinence, or say 'none'?

questions.text: Are you pregnant or could you be pregnant?
questions.clarification: Please say yes or no if you are or could be pregnant?

questions.text: When was your last menstrual period?
questions.clarification: Please give an approximate date or say 'not applicable'?

questions.text: Do you have any joint or muscle problems?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about joint or muscle problems like arthritis, back pain, joint replacements, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: Could you tell me more about your [CONDITION]?
What treatments do you have for your [CONDITION]?
Does your [CONDITION] limit your daily activities?

questions.text: Do you use any mobility aids?
questions.clarification: Please tell me about mobility aids like walking stick, frame, wheelchair, or say 'none'?

questions.text: Please list your current medications, including tablets, inhalers, injections, and patches. If none, just say none.
questions.clarification: Please list all your medications or say 'none' if you don't take any?
followUpQuestions: How often do you take each medication?
Do you have any problems taking your medications?
Have you had any recent changes to your medications?

questions.text: Do you have any allergies? Please include medications, foods, latex, and describe the reaction. If none, say none.
questions.clarification: Please describe any allergies and reactions, or say 'none'?
followUpQuestions: What exactly happens when you're exposed to [CONDITION]?
How severe is your allergic reaction?
Do you carry emergency medication like an EpiPen?

questions.text: Do you take any herbal remedies or supplements?
questions.clarification: Please list any herbal remedies or supplements, or say 'none'?

questions.text: Do you have any particular concerns about your operation or anaesthetic?
questions.clarification: Please share any concerns or worries, or say 'none'?

questions.text: What are your expectations from this operation? What do you hope to achieve?
questions.clarification: Please tell me what you hope to achieve from this operation?

questions.text: Is there anything else you would like to tell us about your health?
questions.clarification: Please share any other health information, or say 'none'?
